get.description: Get all the available Timezones translated on the User Language.

Get the authenticated user information.If is the first time that the user logins, the api uses the default workspace and default project name to insert a new Workspace and Project.
The format of the Workspace is %s Workspace
It will be replaced with *FirstName | LastName | UserName * in that order, the first that is not null
The Same rules apply to Project
